title: Best of The Herd: 10/18/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 10/18/2019
description:
Colin says the Chiefs are too reliant on Patrick Mahomes and that's why they could struggle while he's hurt. He thinks the loser of the Eagles/Cowboys game is not out of the race for the division because both teams schedules. He thinks Jon Gruden and the Raiders might have something going if they can upset the Packers this weekend. Plus, former Ohio State and Florida Head Coach Urban Meyer explains why Lincoln Riley would at least consider the Cowboys head coaching job if it opened up.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
